title: 09/24/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
itunes:title: 09/24/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Florio
description:
Mike Florio tells Dan how he feels about the taunting rule and all the taunting penalties. Mike says the league made taunting a point of emphases but did a poor job in educating the referees.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Mike Florio tells Dan how he feels about the taunting rule and all the taunting penalties. Mike says the league made taunting a point of emphases but did a poor job in educating the referees.
